entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as a person who has seen gnomes before and knows how to handle them. He is bent double with his head in a peony bush, indicating that he is trying to observe the gnomes without being noticed.

entities.name: peony bush
entities.description: The peony bush is described as a location where Ron is hiding and observing the gnomes. It shudders violently when there is scuffling noise.

entities.name: gnome
entities.description: The gnome is described as a small, leathery-looking creature with a large, knobbly, bald head exactly like a potato. It has horny little feet and kicks out at Ron when he tries to hold it.

entities.name: father christmas
entities.description: Father Christmas is mentioned as a comparison for the gnomes, but it is clear that they are not like him. They are small and leathery-looking, unlike Father Christmas.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as having a shocked look on his face when he sees Ron handling the gnome.

relationships.description: Ron handles the gnome by grasping it around the ankles and turning it upside-down. He then raises it above his head and starts to swing it in great circles like a lasso.
Ron knows how to make the gnomes dizzy so they can't find their way back to the gnomeholes.
